Screen is a full-screen window manager that multiplexes a physical terminal between several processes (typically interactive shells).Â When screen is called, it creates a single window with a shell in it (or the specified command) and then gets out of your way so that you can use the program as you normally would.

Generally, when creating a sentinel error value, the errors.New function from the errors package is used instead of the fmt.Errorf function youâ€™ve been using thus far.
